message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase a high-quality product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120. Is this something you'd be interested in?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, I'm not quite willing to go as low as $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $110. Would you be open to that price?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $100? That's the lowest I can go.
I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $105. That's the lowest I can go without losing money on the deal.
I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $100 and $105. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $102.50?
